name: UDJ01SettingBasedScalar
doc: Scales input basedon a double property in the SharedUserSettings

XAxisScalarSettingName: Name of the property that will be used to clamp the X Axis of this value
YAxisScalarSettingName: Name of the property that will be used to clamp the Y Axis of this value
ZAxisScalarSettingName: Name of the property that will be used to clamp the Z Axis of this value
MaxValueClamp: Set the maximium value of this setting on each axis.
MinValueClamp: Set the minimum value of this setting on each axis.
